VISION
Global gender equality research institute, leading an inclusive society.
ESTABLISHING OBJECTIVE
Conduct comprehensive research on women’s issues and contribute to women’s social participation, welfare promotion and the development of women and nation by advancing women’s policy and fostering women’s ability and providing women’s information
MISSION
To contribute to the establishment of national gender equality policies for realization of gender-equal society and to the enhancement of citizen happiness.
